pages.title: Whale Shark
pages.text: The whale shark ($(o)Rhincodon typus$()) is a slow-moving, filter-feeding carpet shark and the largest known extant fish species.$(br2)The largest confirmed individual had a length of 18.8 m ($(o)61.7 ft).

pages.title: Whale Shark
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★★★$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 8$(br2)Growth time: 14 Days
